channel.title: Python Conference Deadlines
channel.description: Countdowns to your favourite Python conferences with calls for participation and resources to submit awesome talks!

item.title: PyCon South Africa 2024 Conference Deadline
item.description:
Conference in Rondebosch, South Africa on October 2 – 6, 2024. CfP: 2024-08-18 23:59:00 AoE.
Find them here: @PyConZA
